attributes.action: Change the existing vehicle tax, and allow individuals to buy vehicle tax in their name, not the vehicle registration.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For private individuals to buy "vehicle tax" in their name, so that no matter what vehicle they are operating it will always be taxed.
"you can only be in one vehicle at a time so why pay tax for each vehicle"

The AA do it, they cover the individual not the vehicle 
(which has a registration)

If you own 2 vehicles you would pay tax for one vehicle, and so on.

This petition applies only to private individuals, companies or businesses would have to purchase vehicle tax as they have always done.
